entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
